packages.name: hubitat_myLeviton
packages.description: Hubitat driver integration for My Leviton Wi-Fi enabled switches and dimmers

packages.name: hubitat_aladdinConnect
packages.description: Hubitat driver integration for Genie Aladdin Connect garage door openers

packages.name: hubitat_boseSoundTouch
packages.description: Hubitat driver integration for Bose SoundTouch speakers

packages.name: hubitat_unifiEvents
packages.description: Hubitat driver integration for UniFi controllers that provides client status without polling

packages.name: hubitat_unifiProtect
packages.description: Hubitat driver integration for UniFi Protect controllers, cameras, doorbells, and lights

packages.name: hubitat_switchbot
packages.description: Hubitat driver integration for SwitchBot devices using the cloud-based SwitchBotAPI, including humidity/temperature sensor, bot, curtain, smart lock, contact sensor, motion sensor, and hub IR functionality

packages.name: hubitat_sonosButtons
packages.description: Hubitat integration for node-sonos-http-api.  Intended as companion functionality for the native Sonos integration on Hubitat.  Supports grouping, album art, and custom actions.

packages.name: hubitat_juiceBox
packages.description: Hubitat integration for the JuiceNet API for JuiceBox EVSE.  Reports charging status, voltage, and power and energy delivery.

packages.name: hubitat_flume
packages.description: Hubitat integration for Flume water meter devices.  Reports usage by minute, hour, day, week, and month.  Also reports Smart Leak alerts.

packages.name: hubitat_midea
packages.description: Hubitat integration for Midea branded and Midea-supplied air conditioning units.  Provides local LAN control of compatible AC units.

packages.name: hubitat_SmartHQ
packages.description: Hubitat integration for SmartHQ appliances.  Provides updates for common attributes as well as automated control.

packages.name: hubitat_broadlink
packages.description: Hubitat local-only integration for Broadlink universal remote controls.  Supports RM3 Mini, RM Pro, RM4 Mini, RM4 Pro, and other devices.

packages.name: hubitat_dahua
packages.description: Hubitat integration for Dahua branded and Dahua-supplied cameras and doorbells.  Supports Dahua, Amcrest, and possibly other brands.

packages.name: hubitat_imageServer
packages.description: Companion image server app for hubitat_unifiProtect and hubitat_dahua camera integrations.  Hosts snapshot images for dashboards and sends Pushover notifications.
